phrase.original: Autosave could not be fully reconstructed. Partial reconstruction attempted instead.
phrase.translation: Automatsko spremanje ne može biti u potpunosti obnovljena. pokušao djelomična rekonstrukcija umjesto.

phrase.original: sRGB transform could not be applied. Image remains in CMYK format.
phrase.translation: sRGB transformirati se ne može primijeniti. Slika ostaje u CMYK formatu.

phrase.original: Both ICC profiles loaded successfully, but CMYK transformation could not be created.
phrase.translation: Oba ICC profili uspješno učitan, ali CMYK transformacija nije mogla biti stvorena.

phrase.original: Could not obtain standard sRGB color profile. CMYK transform abandoned.
phrase.translation: Ne mogu dobiti standardnu sRGB profil boja. CMYK transformaciju napušten.

phrase.original: Embedded ICC profile is invalid. CMYK transform could not be performed.
phrase.translation: Ugrađeni ICC profil nije valjan. CMYK transformacija nije mogla biti izvedena.

phrase.original: ICC profile could not be applied. Image remains in original profile.
phrase.translation: ICC profil ne može se primijeniti. Slika ostaje u originalnom profilu.

phrase.original: Both ICC profiles loaded successfully, but transformation could not be created.
phrase.translation: Oba ICC profili uspješno učitan, ali transformacija nije mogla biti stvorena.

phrase.original: Could not obtain standard sRGB color profile. Color management has been disabled for this image.
phrase.translation: Ne mogu dobiti standardnu sRGB profil boja. Upravljanje bojama onemogućen za ovu sliku.

phrase.original: Embedded ICC profile is invalid. Color management has been disabled for this image.
phrase.translation: Ugrađeni ICC profil nije valjan. Upravljanje bojama onemogućen za ovu sliku.

phrase.original: ExifTool could not be started. Metadata unavailable for this session.
phrase.translation: ExifTool se ne može pokrenuti. Metapodaci nedostupan za ovu sesiju.

phrase.original: Please wait while the tag database is created
phrase.translation: Molimo pričekajte dok se oznaka baza podataka stvorena

phrase.original: The tag database handles technical details of the 20,000+ metadata tags supported by PhotoDemon. Creating the database takes 10 to 15 seconds, and it only needs to be created once, when the metadata editor is used for the first time.
phrase.translation: Oznaka baza podataka obrađuje tehničke pojedinosti 20.000 metapodataka oznake podržanih od strane PhotoDemon. Stvaranje baze podataka traje 10 do 15 sekundi, i to samo treba biti izrađen jednom, kada se koristi urednik metapodataka za prvi put.

phrase.original: This image does not contain any metadata.
This file format does not support metadata. Metadata processing skipped.
phrase.translation: Ovaj format ne podržava metapodataka. obrada metapodataka preskače.

phrase.original: ExifTool initiated successfully. Ready to process metadata.
phrase.translation: ExifTool uspješno pokrenut. Spremni za obradu metapodataka.

phrase.original: WARNING! ExifTool Input/Output pipes could not be created.
WARNING! ExifTool.exe could not be started.
phrase.translation: UPOZORENJE! ExifTool.exe se ne može pokrenuti.

phrase.original: Failed to start plugin service (couldn't create pipe).
phrase.translation: Za početak dodatak uslugu (nije mogao stvoriti cijev) nije uspjelo.

phrase.original: Failed to start plugin service (couldn't create process: %1).
phrase.translation: Za početak dodatak servis nije uspjelo (ne mogu stvoriti proces: %1).

phrase.original:
Before lossless copies can be saved, you must save this image at least once.
Lossless copies will be saved to the same folder as this initial image save.
phrase.translation: Prije Lossless kopije se mogu spremiti, morate spremiti ovu sliku barem once. BCRL Lossless kopija bit će spremljena u istu mapu kao i ove početne slike spasiti.

phrase.original:
The zLib compression library (zlibwapi.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable PDI saving, please allow %1 to download plugin updates by going to the Tools -> Options menu, and selecting the 'offer to download core plugins' check box.
phrase.translation:
Kompresija knjižnica žlibama (zlibwapi.dll) je označena kao nestalo ili onemogućen o programu initialization.
To omogućiti PDI štednje, dopustite %1 za download plugin ažuriranja odlaskom na Tools -> Options, i odabirom „ponudu za preuzimanje jezgre okvir dodataka.

phrase.original:
An unspecified error occurred when attempting to save this image. Please try saving the image to an alternate format.
If the problem persists, please report it to the PhotoDemon developers via photodemon.org/contact
phrase.translation:
Došlo je do neodređene pogreške pri pokušaju spasiti ovu sliku. Pokušajte spremiti sliku na alternativni format.
If ne riješi problem, molimo vas da ga prijaviti PhotoDemon programere putem photodemon.org

phrase.original: Unfortunately, this PC does not have enough memory to create a %1x%2 image. Please reduce the requested size and try again.
phrase.translation: Nažalost, ovo računalo nema dovoljno memorije za stvaranje %1x %2 slike. Smanjite traženi veličinu i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: Abducting image and probing it for weaknesses
Accelerating to 88mph in order to antique-ify this image
phrase.translation: Ubrzava do 88mph kako bi se starinski razjasnit ovu sliku

phrase.original: Engaging hipsters to perform sepia conversion
phrase.translation: Angažiranje hipsters za obavljanje Sepia pretvorbe

phrase.original: Putting image to sleep, then measuring its REM cycles
phrase.translation: Stavljanje slika na spavanje, a zatim mjerenjem njegove REM ciklusa

phrase.original: Counting the number of unique colors in this image
phrase.translation: Računajući broj jedinstvenih boja na ovoj slici

phrase.original:
This menu item only appears in the Visual Basic IDE.
You can use the MenuTest() sub in the Filters_Miscellaneous module to test your own filters. I typically do this first, then once the filter is working properly, I give it a subroutine of its own.
phrase.translation:
Ova stavka izbornika pojavljuje se samo u Visual Basic IDE.
You mogu koristiti MenuTest () sub u Filters_Miscellaneous modul za testiranje vlastite filtere. Ja obično to prvo, a zatim nakon što se filter radi kako treba, dajem ga potprogram za sebe.

phrase.original: Image is all one color. Autocrop unnecessary.
phrase.translation: Slika je sve jedna boja. Autocrop nepotrebno.

phrase.original: Image is already cropped intelligently. Autocrop abandoned. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: Slika već je ošišan inteligentno. Autocrop napušten. (Nije bilo promjena na sliku.)

phrase.original: No active selection found. Crop abandoned.
phrase.translation: Nema aktivnog odabira pronađen. Obrezivanje napušten.
Rotirajući slika u smjeru kazaljke sata

phrase.original: Image is fully transparent. Trim abandoned.
phrase.translation: Slika je potpuno transparentan. Trim napušten.

phrase.original: Image is already trimmed. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: Slika već je obrubljen. (Nije bilo promjena na sliku.)

phrase.original: GDI+ failed to render blur effect (Error Code %1).
phrase.translation: GDI nije uspio uzvratiti zamućenja učinak (kod pogreške %1).

phrase.original: GDI+ failed to set effect parameters.
phrase.translation: GDI nije uspio postaviti efekt parametre.

phrase.original: GDI+ failed to create blur effect object
phrase.translation: GDI uspio stvoriti blur efekt objekt

phrase.original: Preparing GDI+ encoder for this filetype
phrase.translation: Priprema GDI enkoder za ovu filetype

phrase.original: %1 save failed (FreeImage_SaveEx silent fail). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: %1 spremanje nije uspjelo (FreeImage_SaveEx tihi uspjeti). Prijavite pogrešku koristeći Pomoć -> Pošaljite Bug Report.

phrase.original: %1 save failed (FreeImage returned blank handle). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: %1 spremanje nije uspjelo (FreeImage vratio prazan ručku). Prijavite pogrešku koristeći Pomoć -> Pošaljite Bug Report.

phrase.original:
The FreeImage interface plug-in (FreeImage.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable support for this image format, please copy the FreeImage.dll file (downloadable from http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
phrase.translation:
Freeimage sučelje plug-in (FreeImage.dll) je označena kao nestalo ili onemogućen o programu initialization.
To omogućiti podršku za ovaj format slike, kopirajte FreeImage.dll datoteku (preuzeti iz http:

phrase.original: Save cannot be completed without FreeImage library.
phrase.translation: Spremi se ne može dovršiti bez FreeImage knjižnici.

phrase.original:
The PDI file "%1" contains compressed data, but the zLib plugin is missing or disabled.
To enable support for compressed PDI files, click Help > Check for Updates, and when prompted, allow PhotoDemon to download all recommended plugins.
phrase.translation:
Datoteka PDI „ %1” sadrži komprimirane podatke, a čep žlibama nedostaje ili disabled.
To omogućiti podršku za komprimirani PDI datoteke, kliknite Pomoć> Provjeri ažuriranja, a kada se to zatraži, dopustiti PhotoDemon preuzeti sve preporučene dodatke.

phrase.original: PDI node could not be read; file may be invalid or corrupted. Load abandoned.
phrase.translation: PDI čvor se ne može pročitati; Datoteka može biti valjan ili je oštećen. Opterećenje napušten.

phrase.original: An error has occurred (#%1 - %2). PDI load abandoned.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do pogreške (# %1 - %2). PDI opterećenje napušten.

phrase.original: Selected file is not in PDI format. Load abandoned.
phrase.translation: Odabrana datoteka nije u PDI formatu. Opterećenje napušten.

phrase.original: GDI+ refused to load image. Dropping back to internal routines and trying again
phrase.translation: GDI odbio učitati sliku. Spustivši se natrag na unutarnje rutine i opet pokušava

phrase.original: clamp them to the nearest available pixel
phrase.translation: spona ih do najbližeg raspoloživog piksela

phrase.original: reflect them across the nearest edge
Are you sure you want to cancel %1?
phrase.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite poništiti %1?

phrase.original: This action will convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers, meaning you can no longer modify layer-specific settings like text, font, color or shape.
phrase.translation: Ova akcija će se pretvoriti tekst i vektorske slojeve na sliku (raster) slojevima, što znači da se više ne može mijenjati postavke sloj specifične poput teksta, font, boju ili oblik.

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to continue?
phrase.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite nastaviti?

phrase.original: Yes. Convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers.
phrase.translation: Da. Pretvori tekst i vektorske slojeve na slici (raster) slojevima.

phrase.original: No. Leave text and vector layers as they are.
phrase.translation: Ne Ostavi tekst i vektorske slojeve kao što su oni.

phrase.original: This text layer will be changed to an image (raster) layer, meaning you can no longer modify its text or font settings.
phrase.translation: Ovaj tekst sloj će se promijeniti u slike (raster) sloja, što znači da se više ne može mijenjati svoje tekstualne ili fonta postavke.

phrase.original: Yes. Please convert this text layer.
phrase.translation: Da. Molimo pretvoriti ovaj tekst sloj.

phrase.original: No. Leave this text layer as it is.
phrase.translation: Ne Ostavite ovaj tekst sloj kao što je to.

phrase.original: I can't decide. Cancel this action.
phrase.translation: Ne mogu se odlučiti. Odustani ovu akciju.

phrase.original: In the future, automatically rasterize without prompting me
phrase.translation: U budućnosti, automatski rasterizaciju bez mene navelo

phrase.original: ICC transform requested, but no data found. Abandoning attempt.
phrase.translation: ICC transformaciju zahtjev, ali nema pronađenih podataka. Napuštanje pokušaj.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the image '%1' could not be found.
If this image was originally located on removable media (DVD, USB drive, etc), please re-insert or re-attach the media and try again.
phrase.translation:
Na žalost, slika „ %1” ne može biti found.
If ova slika je izvorno bio smješten na prijenosni medij (DVD, USB disk, itd), ponovno umetanje ili ponovno priključite medij i pokušajte ponovno.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image:
%1
Please use another program to save this image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading it. Thanks!
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, PhotoDemon nije mogao učitati sljedeću sliku:
%1
Please koristiti neki drugi program za spremanje ove slike u općem obliku (kao što je JPEG ili PNG) prije umetanja. Hvala!

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image:
%1
Please use another program to save this image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading it into PhotoDemon. Thanks!
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, PhotoDemon nije mogao učitati sljedeću sliku:
%1
Please upotrebljavati neki drugi program za spremanje ove slike u općem obliku (kao što je JPEG ili PNG) prije unošenja u PhotoDemon. Hvala!

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image(s):
%1 Please verify that these image(s) exist, and that they use a supported image format (like JPEG or PNG). Thanks!
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, PhotoDemon nije mogao učitati sljedeću sliku (e):
%1 Please potvrditi da postoje ovi slika (e), i da oni koriste podržani format slike (kao što je JPEG ili PNG). Hvala!

phrase.original:
This macro does not contain any recordable actions. Are you sure you want to stop recording?
(Press No to continue recording.)
phrase.translation:
Ovaj makro ne sadrži nikakve radnje za snimanje. Jeste li sigurni da želite zaustaviti snimanje?
(Pritisnite No za nastavak snimanja.)

phrase.original:
If you do not save this macro, all actions recorded during this session will be permanently lost. Are you sure you want to cancel?
(Press No to return to the Save Macro screen. Note that you can always delete this macro later if you decide you don't want it.)
phrase.translation:
Ako ne spasiti ovu makro, sve akcije snimljene tijekom ove sjednice će biti trajno izgubljeni. Jeste li sigurni da želite poništiti?
(Pritisnite No za povratak na makro zaslona Spremi. Imajte na umu da uvijek možete izbrisati makronaredbu kasnije ako odlučite da ne želite).

phrase.original: Warning: last chance to save macro
phrase.translation: Upozorenje: posljednja prilika za spremanje makro

phrase.original: Incompatible macro version found. Macro playback abandoned.
phrase.translation: Nekompatibilna makro verzija pronađeno. napušten Makro reprodukcije.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, this macro file is no longer supported by the current version of PhotoDemon.
In version 6.0, PhotoDemon macro files were redesigned to support new features, improve performance, and solve some long-standing reliability issues. Unfortunately, this means that macros recorded prior to version 6.0 are no longer compatible. You will need to re-record these macros from scratch.
(Note that any old macro files will still work in old versions of PhotoDemon, if you absolutely need to access them.)
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, ovaj makro datoteka više ne po trenutnom verzijom PhotoDemon.
In verzije 6.0 podržava, PhotoDemon makro datoteke su redizajnirani kako bi podržao nove značajke, poboljšanje performansi i riješiti neke dugogodišnje probleme pouzdanosti. Nažalost, to znači da makronaredbe snimljeni prije verzije 6.0 više nisu kompatibilni. Morat ćete ponovno snimiti te makronaredbe iz scratch.
(Imajte na umu da su sve stare makro datoteke i dalje će raditi na starim verzijama PhotoDemon, ako apsolutno potrebno za pristup njima.)

phrase.original:
The selected scanner or digital camera isn't responding.
Please make sure the device is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation:
Odabrana skener ili digitalni fotoaparat nije responding.
Please provjerite je li uređaj uključen i spreman za uporabu.

phrase.original:
The scanner/digital camera interface plug-in (EZTW32.dll) was marked as missing upon program initialization.
To enable scanner support, please copy the EZTW32.dll file (available for download from http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
phrase.translation:
Skener / digitalni fotoaparat sučelje plug-in (EZTW32.dll) je označena kao nestalo nakon inicijalizacije programa.
Da biste omogućili podršku skenera, kopirajte EZTW32.dll datoteku (dostupan za preuzimanje s http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm) u plug-in katalog i ponovno učitati program.

phrase.original: Unknown error occurred. Please make sure your scanner is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do nepoznate pogreške. Molimo provjerite je li skener uključen i spreman za uporabu.

phrase.original: Scan successful, but temporary file save failed. Is it possible that your hard drive is full (or almost full)?
phrase.translation: Skeniranje uspješna, ali privremena datoteka spremanje nije uspjelo. Je li moguće da je vaš hard disk je pun (ili gotovo puna)?

phrase.original: Unable to acquire DIB lock. Please make sure no other programs are accessing the scanner. If the problem persists, reboot and try again.
phrase.translation: Nije moguće steći Dib bravu. Molimo provjerite da nema drugih programa pristupate skener. Ako se problem nastavi, ponovno podizanje sustava i pokušajte ponovo.

phrase.original: Temporary file access error. This can be caused when running on a system with limited access rights. Please enable admin rights and try again.
phrase.translation: Privremena pogreška pristupom. To može biti uzrokovano kada se izvodi na sustavu s ograničenim pravima pristupa. Molimo omogućite admin prava i pokušajte ponovno.

phrase.original: Scan canceled at the user's request.
The scanner returned an error code that wasn't specified in the EZTW32.dll documentation (Error #%1). Please visit http://www.eztwain.com for more information.
phrase.translation: Skener se vratila kod pogreške koje nije naveden u EZTW32.dll dokumentacije (pogreška # %1). Posjetite http:

phrase.original: Multipage image found. Loading page #%1 of %2
phrase.translation: Za više slika pronađena. Učitavanje stranica # %1 od %2

phrase.original: Using OptiPNG to optimize the PNG file. This may take a moment
phrase.translation: Korištenje OptiPNG za optimiziranje PNG. To može potrajati nekoliko trenutaka

phrase.original: Using pngquant to optimize the PNG file. This may take a moment
phrase.translation: Korištenje pngquant za optimiziranje PNG. To može potrajati nekoliko trenutaka

phrase.original: PNGQuant could not write file. Default 32bpp image was saved instead.
phrase.translation: PNGQuant ne može pisati datoteke. Zadana 32 bpp slika je spremljena umjesto.

phrase.original: Image successfully sent to Windows Photo Printer.
phrase.translation: Slika je uspješno poslana Windows Photo Printer.

phrase.original:
Unknown processor request submitted: %1
Please report this bug via the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
Zahtjev Nepoznat poslano: %1
Please prijaviti taj bug putem Pomoć -> Pošaljite Bug izbornik Report.

phrase.original: There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) by shutting down unneeded programs - especially your web browser, if it is open - then try the action again.
phrase.translation: Nema dovoljno memorije za nastavak ovu operaciju. Oslobodite memoriju sustava (RAM) zatvaranjem nepotreban programe - posebno web preglednik, ako je otvoren - a zatim ponovno pokušajte akciju.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, this image file appears to be invalid. This can happen if a file does not contain image data, or if it contains image data in an unsupported format.
- If you downloaded this image from the Internet, the download may have terminated prematurely. Please try downloading the image again.
- If this image file came from a digital camera, scanner, or other image editing program, it's possible that PhotoDemon simply doesn't understand this particular file format. Please save the image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG), then reload it.
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, ova slikovna datoteka Čini se da je nevažeći. To se može dogoditi ako datoteka ne sadrži slikovne podatke, ili ako sadrži slikovne podatke u podržan format.
- Ako ste preuzeli ovu sliku s Interneta, preuzimanje može se privremeno prekida. Pokušajte preuzeti sliku again.
- Ako ova slikovna datoteka je došao iz digitalnog fotoaparata, skenera ili drugog program za uređivanje slika, moguće je da PhotoDemon jednostavno ne razumije ovu posebnu format datoteke. Molimo spremite sliku u generičkom obliku (kao što je JPEG ili PNG), a zatim ga ponovno.

phrase.original: The specified file could not be located. If it was located on removable media, please re-insert the proper floppy disk, CD, or portable drive. If the file is not located on portable media, make sure that: 1) the file hasn't been deleted, and... 2) the file location provided to PhotoDemon is correct.
phrase.translation: Navedena datoteka nije pronađena. Ako se nalazi na prijenosni medij, ponovno umetnite odgovarajuću disketu, CD ili prijenosni disk. Ako datoteka ne nalazi na prijenosni medij, provjerite: 1) datoteka nije izbrisan, a... 2) mjesto datoteke pod uvjetom da PhotoDemon je ispravan.

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon cannot locate additional information for this error. That probably means this error is a bug, and it needs to be fixed!
Would you like to submit a bug report? (It takes less than one minute, and it helps everyone who uses the software.)
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon ne možete pronaći dodatne informacije o ovoj pogrešci. To vjerojatno znači da je ovo greška je bug, i to treba popraviti!
Would li podnijeti izvješće o grešci? (To traje manje od jedne minute, a to pomaže svima koji koristi softver).

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has experienced an error. Details on the problem include:
Error number %1 Description: %2
%3
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon je došlo do pogreške. Pojedinosti o problemu uključuju:
Error broj %1 Description: %2
%3

phrase.original:
Thank you for submitting a bug report. To make sure your bug is addressed as quickly as possible, PhotoDemon needs you to answer one more question.
Do you have a GitHub account? (If you have no idea what this means, answer "No".)
phrase.translation:
Hvala na slanju izvješća o grešci. Da bi bili sigurni da je vaš bug je upućena što je brže moguće, PhotoDemon vam treba odgovoriti na još jedno question.
Do imate GitHub račun? (Ako nemate pojma što to znači, odgovor „ne”.)

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has automatically opened a GitHub bug report webpage for you. In the Title box, please enter the following error number with a short description of the problem: %1
Any additional details you can provide in the large text box, including the steps that led up to this error, will help it get fixed as quickly as possible.
When finished, click the Submit New Issue button. Thank you!
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon automatski je otvorio GitHub bug izvještaj web stranicu za vas. U naslovu okvir, unesite sljedeći broj pogrešaka s kratkim opisom problema: %1
Any dodatne informacije možete pružiti u velikoj tekstualni okvir, uključujući korake koji su doveli do ove pogreške, pomoći će dobiti fiksni što je brže possible.
When završili, kliknite na gumb Pošalji novog izdanja. Hvala ti!

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has automatically opened a bug report webpage for you. In the Comment box, please describe the steps that led to this error.
Also in that box, please include the following error number: %1
When finished, click the Submit button. Thank you!
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon automatski otvorila je bug izvještaj web stranicu za vas. U okviru za komentare, molimo opisati korake koji su doveli do ovog error.
Also u toj kutiji, navedite sljedeće broj pogreške: %1
When završi, kliknite na gumb Pošalji. Hvala ti!

phrase.original:
An error occurred when attempting to save this image. The FreeImage plugin reported the following error details:
%1
In the meantime, please try saving the image to an alternate format. You can also let the PhotoDemon developers know about this via the Help > Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
Došlo je do pogreške pri pokušaju spasiti ovu sliku. Čep FreeImage izvijestio sljedeće podatke o pogreškama:
%1
In međuvremenu, pokušajte spremanja slike u izmijenjenom formatu. Također možete pustiti PhotoDemon programeri znaju o tome putem Pomoć> Pošalji Bug izbornik Report.

phrase.original: Output format not recognized. Save aborted. Please use the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu item to report this incident.
phrase.translation: Izlazni format nije prepoznat. Spremi prekinut. Molimo koristite pomoć -> Pošaljite Bug stavku Izvješće izbornika prijaviti ovaj incident.

phrase.original: Thumbnail save failed (FreeImage_SaveEx silent fail). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: Thumbnail spremanje nije uspjelo (FreeImage_SaveEx tihi uspjeti). Prijavite pogrešku koristeći Pomoć -> Pošaljite Bug Report.

phrase.original: Thumbnail save failed (FreeImage returned blank handle). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: Thumbnail spremanje nije uspjelo (FreeImage vratio prazan ručku). Prijavite pogrešku koristeći Pomoć -> Pošaljite Bug Report.
Thumbnail Spremanje nije uspjelo (neodređeni GDI pogrešku).

phrase.original: Could not retrieve program window - the program appears to have been unloaded.
phrase.translation: Nije moguće dohvatiti prozor programa - program izgleda kao da su neopterećeni.

phrase.original: An error occurred while attempting to load %1. Please verify that the file is a valid PhotoDemon selection file.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do pogreške pri pokušaju učitavanja %1. Provjerite je li datoteka valjana PhotoDemon odabir datoteka.

phrase.original: Unknown error occurred. Selection was not saved. Please try again.
phrase.translation: Došlo je do nepoznate pogreške. Izbor nije spremljen. Molim te pokušaj ponovno.

phrase.original: This action requires an active selection. Please create a selection before continuing.
phrase.translation: Ova akcija zahtijeva aktivnu selekciju. Molimo kreirajte izbor prije nastavka.

phrase.original: Release the mouse button to complete the lasso selection
phrase.translation: Otpustite tipku miša za dovršetak laso izbor

phrase.original: Click on the first point to complete the polygon selection
phrase.translation: Kliknite na prvom mjestu za dovršetak odabira poligona

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a value between %2 and %3.
phrase.translation: %1 nije valjan entry. Please unijeti vrijednost između 2 %i 3%.

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a numeric value.
phrase.translation: %1 nije valjan entry. Please upisati numeričku vrijednost.

phrase.original: Update check postponed (a check has been performed recently)
phrase.translation: Update provjerite odgođena (provjera je izvedena u zadnje vrijeme)

phrase.original: Initializing software updater (this feature can be disabled from the Tools -> Options menu)
phrase.translation: Inicijalizacija Software Updater (ova značajka može isključiti iz Tools -> Options)

phrase.original: WARNING! GDI+ could not be found. (PhotoDemon requires GDI+ for proper program operation.)
phrase.translation: UPOZORENJE! GDI nije moguće pronaći. (PhotoDemon zahtijeva GDI za pravilan rad programa.)

phrase.original: There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) and try again. If the problem persists, reduce the zoom value and try again.
phrase.translation: Nema dovoljno memorije za nastavak ovu operaciju. Oslobodite memoriju sustava (RAM) i pokušajte ponovno. Ako se problem nastavi, smanjiti vrijednost zumiranja i pokušajte ponovno.

phrase.original: Viewport rendering paused due to unexpected error (#%1)
phrase.translation: Viewport renderiranje zastao zbog neočekivane pogreške (# %1)

phrase.original: The clipboard is empty or it does not contain a valid picture format. Please copy a valid image onto the clipboard and try again.
phrase.translation: Međuspremnik je prazna ili ne sadrži valjan format slike. Kopirajte valjanu sliku na clipboard i pokušajte ponovno.

phrase.original: Image URL found. Attempting to download
Image download failed. Please copy a valid image URL and try again.
phrase.translation: Preuzimanje slike nije uspjelo. Kopirajte važeći URL slike i pokušajte ponovno.

phrase.original: Failed to load embedded image; invalid header found.
phrase.translation: Nije ugrađen učitavanje slike; nevažeći zaglavlje pronađeno.

phrase.original: ExifTool plugin missing. Metadata import abandoned.
phrase.translation: ExifTool čep nedostaje. Metapodaci uvoz napušten.

phrase.original: Removing metadata with potential privacy concerns
phrase.translation: Uklanjanje metapodataka s potencijalnim problemima privatnosti

phrase.original: Metadata may not have been embedded (but saved image still written successfully).
phrase.translation: Metapodaci možda nisu ugrađeni (ali spasio slika i dalje uspješno napisano).

phrase.original: Unfortunately, the number of images you selected exceeds what Windows® allows for a single load operation. Please try again with a smaller set of selected images.
phrase.translation: Nažalost, broj slika koje ste odabrali prelazi ono što Windows omogućuje jednoj operaciji opterećenja. Pokušajte ponovno s manjim skupom odabranih slika.

phrase.original: File doesn't have valid pdPackage header. Abandoning load.
phrase.translation: Datoteka nema važeću pdPackage zaglavlje. Napuštanje teret.

phrase.original: File doesn't match requested sub-type value. Abandoning load.
phrase.translation: Datoteka ne odgovara traženi pod-tipa vrijednosti. Napuštanje teret.

phrase.original: Legacy file format could not be decoded.
phrase.translation: Ostavština format datoteke ne mogu se dekodirati.

phrase.original: Node struct size in header is invalid. This file looks to be corrupt! Abandoning load.
phrase.translation: Čvor struct veličina u zaglavlju nije valjan. Ova datoteka izgleda da se pokvari! Napuštanje teret.

phrase.original: WARNING! Decompressed directory chunk size shows possible CRC error (
phrase.translation: UPOZORENJE! Otpakirati veličina imenik komad pokazuje mogući CRC pogreške (

phrase.original: Directory is compressed, but zLib failed to decompress it. Error code returned: %1
phrase.translation: Direktorij je komprimirana, ali žlibama nije to dekompresiju. Kod pogreške vratila: %1

phrase.original: Directory chunk is compressed, but zLib is missing. Decompression impossible; abandoning load.
phrase.translation: Katalog komad je komprimirana, ali žlibama nedostaje. Dekompresija nemoguće; napuštanje teret.

phrase.original: Data chunk is compressed, but zLib failed to decompress it. Error code returned: %1
phrase.translation: Blok podataka je komprimirana, ali žlibama nije to dekompresiju. Kod pogreške vratila: %1

phrase.original: Data chunk is compressed, but zLib is missing. Decompression impossible; abandoning load.
phrase.translation: Blok podataka je komprimirana, ali žlibama nedostaje. Dekompresija nemoguće; napuštanje teret.

phrase.original: File node is compressed, but zLib failed to decompress it. Error code returned: %1
phrase.translation: File čvor je komprimirana, ali žlibama nije to dekompresiju. Kod pogreške vratila: %1

phrase.original: File node is compressed, but zLib is missing. Decompression impossible; abandoning load.
phrase.translation: File čvor je komprimirana, ali žlibama nedostaje. Dekompresija nemoguće; napuštanje teret.

phrase.original: File node is uncompressed, but size is listed as zero. Load impossible; abandoning attempt.
phrase.translation: File čvor je nekomprimirani, ali veličina je navedena kao nula. Učitaj nemoguće; napuštanje pokušaj.

phrase.original: Disclaimer: all hardware acceleration data is provided by the operating system. It specifically represents GDI acceleration, which is independent from DirectX and OpenGL. OS version and desktop mode also affect support capabilities. For best results, please run PhotoDemon on Windows 7 or 8, on an Aero-enabled desktop.
phrase.translation: Odricanje: Svi hardversko ubrzanje podaci pružaju operativnog sustava. To je posebno predstavlja GDI ubrzanja, koja je neovisna od DirectX i OpenGL. Verzija OS i desktop način rada također utječu na mogućnosti podrške. Za najbolje rezultate, molimo trčanje PhotoDemon na Windows 7 ili 8, na aero-omogućen desktop.

phrase.original: For more information on GDI hardware acceleration, visit http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ff729480
phrase.translation: Za više informacija o GDI hardversko ubrzanje, posjetite http:

phrase.original: Shift key: preserve layer aspect ratio
Mouse Wheel = VERTICAL SCROLL, Shift + Wheel = HORIZONTAL SCROLL, Ctrl + Wheel = ZOOM
phrase.translation: Miš kotača = okomito pomicanje, SHIFT kotača = horizontalno pomicanje Ctrl kotača = ZOOM

phrase.original: Center the image inside the viewport

Drag an image onto this space to begin editing.
You can also use the Open Image button on the left, or the File > Open and File > Import menus.
phrase.translation:
Povucite sliku na ovaj prostor za početak editing.
You također koristiti gumb Otvori sliku na lijevoj strani, or na File> Open i File> Import izbornika.

phrase.original: Click to enter a full color selection screen.
phrase.translation: Kliknite da biste upisali zaslon za odabir boje.

phrase.original: Click to make the main screen's paint color the active color.
phrase.translation: Kliknite da bi glavni zaslon je boja boja aktivnu boju.
Okrenite nijansi smjeru kazaljke na satu

phrase.original: Apply this action to the current image.
phrase.translation: Nanesite ovu akciju na trenutnu sliku.

phrase.original: Exit this tool. No changes will be made to the image.
phrase.translation: Izlaz iz ovog alata. Nema promjene će biti na slici.

phrase.original: Reset all settings to their default values.
phrase.translation: Resetiranje svih postavki na zadane vrijednosti.

phrase.original: Randomly select new settings for this tool. This is helpful for exploring how different settings affect the image.
phrase.translation: Nasumce odabrati nove postavke za ovaj alat. To je korisno za istraživanje kako različite postavke utječu na sliku.

phrase.original: Save the current settings as a new preset.
phrase.translation: Spremanje trenutnih postavki kao novi unaprijed.

phrase.original: Previously saved presets can be selected here. You can save the current settings as a new preset by clicking the Save Preset button on the right.
phrase.translation: Prethodno spremljene gotove konfiguracije mogu biti odabrani ovdje. Možete spremiti trenutne postavke kao novi unaprijed klikom na gumb Spremi Preset na desnoj strani.

phrase.original: Once this image has been saved to disk, its filename will appear here.
phrase.translation: Nakon što se ova slika je spremljena na disk, njegova datoteke će se pojaviti ovdje.

phrase.original: This image does not have a filename.
Hover an image thumbnail to see its name and current file location.
phrase.translation: Zadržite se minijature slike da vidi svoje ime i trenutnu lokaciju datoteke.

phrase.original: copy all relevant metadata to the new file
phrase.translation: kopirati sve relevantne metapodatke u novu datoteku

phrase.original: erase tags that might be personal (including GPS and location)
phrase.translation: brisanje oznake koje bi mogle biti osobni (uključujući GPS i lokaciju)

phrase.original: This image does not contain metadata.
The final width and height measurements must be between 1 and 32760 pixels.
phrase.translation: Konačni širina i visina mjerenja mora biti između 1 i 32760 piksela.

phrase.original: Preserve aspect ratio (sometimes called Constrain Proportions). Use this option to resize an image while keeping the width and height in sync.
phrase.translation: Čuvaju omjer dimenzija (ponekad se naziva Constrain Proporcije). Koristite ovu opciju za promjenu veličine slike, a imajući u širinu i visinu u sync.

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used to resize the image.
phrase.translation: Promjena mjerne jedinice koriste za promjenu veličine slike.

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used for image resolution (pixel density).
phrase.translation: Promjena mjerne jedinice koja se koristi za razlučivost slike (gustoća piksela).

phrase.original: exact aspect ratio will vary by image
phrase.translation: Točan omjer će se mijenjati prema slici

phrase.original: exact size will vary by image
phrase.translation: Točna veličina će se razlikovati od slike
(Poruka će se pojaviti ovdje u radnom vremenu)

phrase.original: Change the image size unit displayed to the left of this box
phrase.translation: Promjena veličine slike jedinice prikazane na lijevoj strani ovog okvira

phrase.original: Select which scanner or camera to use
phrase.translation: Odaberite koju skener ili fotoaparat za korištenje
Rotiraj za 90 u smjeru kazaljke sata

phrase.original: Show when multiple images are loaded
Support us with a small donation (thank you!)
Read license and terms of use
A new version of PhotoDemon is available. The update is automatically processing in the background
phrase.translation: Nova verzija PhotoDemon je dostupna. Ažuriranje automatski obrađuje u pozadini

phrase.original: This copy of PhotoDemon is up to date.
phrase.translation: Ovaj primjerak PhotoDemon je u toku.

phrase.original:
A new version of PhotoDemon is available!
The update is automatically processing in the background. You will receive a new notification when it completes.
phrase.translation:
Nova verzija PhotoDemon dostupan!
The ažuriranje automatski obrađuje u pozadini. Vi ćete primiti novu obavijest kada završi.

phrase.original:
This copy of PhotoDemon is the newest version available.
(Current version: %1.%2.%3)
phrase.translation:
Ovaj primjerak PhotoDemon je najnovija verzija available.
(Trenutna verzija: %1. %2. %3)

phrase.original: Asynchronous metadata check complete! Updating metadata collection
phrase.translation: Asinkroni metapodataka provjeriti potpuna! skup metapodataka Ažuriranje

phrase.original:
Thank you for submitting a bug report. To make sure your bug is addressed as quickly as possible, PhotoDemon needs to know where to send it.
Do you have a GitHub account? (If you have no idea what this means, answer "No".)
phrase.translation:
Hvala na slanju izvješća o grešci. Da bi bili sigurni da je vaš bug je upućena što je brže moguće, PhotoDemon treba znati gdje poslati it.
Do imate GitHub račun? (Ako nemate pojma što to znači, odgovor „ne”.)

phrase.original: Please wait while the new language is applied
phrase.translation: Molimo pričekajte dok se primjenjuje novi jezik

phrase.original: This image does not contain any GPS metadata.
phrase.translation: Ova slika ne sadrži bilo koji GPS metapodataka.
Rotirajte sliku za 90 u smjeru kazaljke sata

phrase.original: sample image for true contrast (slower but more accurate)
phrase.translation: Uzorak slika za istinsku razliku od (sporije, ali preciznije)

phrase.original: Converting image to black and white
Adjusting hue, saturation, and luminance values
phrase.translation: Podešavanje nijanse, zasićenosti i vrijednosti osvijetljenosti

phrase.original: color to replace (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: boja za zamjenu (desni klik pregled za odabir)

phrase.original: left-click to add new nodes or drag existing nodes
phrase.translation: lijevi klik za dodavanje novih čvorova ili povući postojeće čvorova

phrase.original: (Note: move the mouse over the histogram to calculate these values)
phrase.translation: (Napomena: premjestiti miš preko histograma izračunati ove vrijednosti)

phrase.original: Please wait while the histogram is updated
phrase.translation: Molimo pričekajte dok se histogram ažurira

phrase.original: Analyzing image histogram for maximum and minimum values
phrase.translation: Analizirajući histogram slike za maksimalne i minimalne vrijednosti

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the shadow input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: Kada je aktivan ovaj gumb, možete postaviti boju ulaznu razinu sjena desnim klikom boju u prozorčiću.

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the highlight input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: Kada je aktivan ovaj gumb, možete postaviti boju ulaznu razinu vrhunac desnim klikom boju u prozorčiću.
Pretvori jednobojnu sliku u sivim tonovima
Pretvaranje jednobojnu sliku u sivim tonovima

phrase.original: Like all monochrome-to-grayscale tools, this tool will produce a blurry image. You can use the Effects -> Sharpen -> Unsharp Masking tool to fix this. (For best results, use an Unsharp Mask radius at least as large as this radius.)
phrase.translation: Kao i sve alate crno-bijeli-to-sivim tonovima, ovaj alat će proizvesti mutna slika. Možete koristiti efekte -> Izoštri -> Unsharp Maskiranje alat to škripac ovaj. (Najbolje rezultate, koristiti nije točno Mask radijus barem veličine prema ovom radijusa).

phrase.original: absorb excessive sky blue, make sky darker in black/white photos
phrase.translation: apsorbirati prekomjerne nebo plavo, da nebo tamnije crne

phrase.original: absorb excessive sky blue, emphasizing clouds
phrase.translation: apsorbirati prekomjerne nebo plavo, s naglaskom na oblake

phrase.original: high blue absorption; correction for sky, cloud, and foliage
phrase.translation: visoka apsorpcija plavo; korekcija za nebo, oblak, i lišće

phrase.original: moderate contrast in black/white outdoor photography
minus blue; reduce haze in aerial photos
phrase.translation: minus plavo; smanjiti neprozirnost u zračnim fotografijama

phrase.original: darken sky in black/white outdoor photography
contrast filter for blue and blue-green absorption
contrast effects, darken sky and water
red for two-color photography (daylight or tungsten)
phrase.translation: crvena za fotografiranje dvije boje (dnevno svjetlo ili volfram)

phrase.original: tricolor red; contrast effects in outdoor scenes
phrase.translation: trobojni crveno; usporediti učinke na otvorenom scene

phrase.original: stereo red; cuts haze, useful for storm or moonlight settings
phrase.translation: Stereo crvena; smanjuje zamućenje, korisno za olujnih ili mjesečine postavke

phrase.original: color separation; extreme sky darkening in black/white photos
phrase.translation: Boja za odvajanje; ekstremni nebo zamračenje u crno

phrase.original: red absorption; useful for contrast in microscopy
phrase.translation: crveni apsorpcija; korisno za razliku od u mikroskopiju

phrase.original: direct color separation; contrast effects in commercial photography
phrase.translation: izravno odvajanje boje; usporediti učinke u komercijalnoj fotografiji

phrase.original: enhance blue and purple objects; useful for fluorescent dyes
phrase.translation: poboljšati plave i ljubičaste predmete; korisno za fluorescentne boje

phrase.original: color separation; calibration using SMPTE color bars
phrase.translation: Boja za odvajanje; kalibracija pomoću SMPTE barova u boji

phrase.original: used for color separation; improves definition of foliage
phrase.translation: koristi se za odvajanje boje; poboljšava definiciju lišće

phrase.original: used for color separation, tungsten tricolor projection
phrase.translation: koristi se za odvajanje boje, volfram trobojni projekciju

phrase.original: cooling filter, 3200K to 5500K; converts indoor lighting to sunlight
phrase.translation: hlađenje filtar 3200K na 5500K; pretvara zatvoreni rasvjete na suncu

phrase.original: warming filter (lowers color temperature), 3400 K to 3200 K
phrase.translation: zagrijavanje filtera (snižava temperaturu boje), 3400 K 3200 K

phrase.original: warming filter, 5500K to 3400K; converts sunlight to incandescent
phrase.translation: zagrijavanje filter, 5500K na 3400K; pretvara sunčevu svjetlost da žarnom niti

phrase.original: remove color before photographing; rarely used for actual photos
phrase.translation: uklanjanje boje prije fotografiranja; rijetko koristi za stvarne fotografije

phrase.original: neutral density filter; equally blocks all light frequencies
phrase.translation: Filter neutralne gustoće; podjednako blokira sve svjetlosne frekvencije

phrase.original: Searching image for potential red-eye locations
phrase.translation: Pretraživanje slika za potencijalne lokacije crvenih očiju
Podešavanje sjena, srednje svijetlih i naglašava

phrase.original: Autosave data found. Would you like to restore it?
phrase.translation: Pronašao Automatsko spremanje podataka. Želite li ga vratiti?

phrase.original: A previous PhotoDemon session terminated unexpectedly. Would you like to automatically recover the following autosaved images?
phrase.translation: Prethodna PhotoDemon sjednica prekine neočekivano. Želite li se automatski oporaviti sljedeće Automatski spremljeno slike?

phrase.original: If you exit now, this autosave data will be lost forever. Are you sure you want to exit?
phrase.translation: Ako izađete sada, to Automatsko spremanje podataka će biti izgubljen zauvijek. Jesi li siguran da želiš izaći?

phrase.original: Warning: autosave data will be deleted
phrase.translation: Upozorenje: Automatsko spremanje podataka bit će izbrisani

phrase.original: enter a name for this preset
A preset with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
phrase.translation: Prethodno s ovim imenom već postoji. Želite li ga prepisati?

phrase.original: Please enter a name for this preset.
Left-click to add new nodes or edit existing nodes. Right-click a node to remove it.
phrase.translation: Kliknite lijevom tipkom miša za dodavanje novih čvorova ili urediti postojeće čvorova. Desnom tipkom miša kliknite čvor da biste ga uklonili.

phrase.original: I understand the risks of running PhotoDemon in the IDE
phrase.translation: Razumijem rizike trčanje PhotoDemon u IDE

phrase.original: Do not display this warning again
You are running PhotoDemon inside the Visual Basic IDE. This is not recommended.
phrase.translation: Vi radite PhotoDemon unutar Visual Basic IDE. To se ne preporučuje.

phrase.original: Please compile PhotoDemon before using it. Many features that rely on subclassing are disabled in the IDE, but some - such as custom command buttons - cannot be disabled without severely impacting the program's functionality. As such, you may experience IDE instability and crashes, especially if you close the program using the IDE's Stop button.
phrase.translation: Molimo sastaviti PhotoDemon prije korištenja. Mnoge značajke koje se oslanjaju na subclassing su onemogućeni u IDE, ali neki - kao što je običaj naredbeni gumbi - ne može se isključiti bez ozbiljnog utjecaja programa funkcionalnost. Kao takav, možete primijetiti IDE nestabilnost i pad, pogotovo ako zatvorite program pomoću gumba IDE-a Stop.

phrase.original: Additionally, like all other photo editors, PhotoDemon relies heavily on multidimensional arrays. Array performance is severely degraded in the IDE, so some functions may perform very slowly.
phrase.translation: Osim toga, kao i sve ostale foto urednika, PhotoDemon uvelike oslanja na višedimenzionalnih polja. Array izvedba je ozbiljno narušen u IDE, tako da neke funkcije mogu obavljati vrlo sporo.

phrase.original: If you insist on running PhotoDemon in the IDE, please do not submit bugs regarding IDE crashes or freezes. PhotoDemon's developers can only address issues and bugs that affect the compiled .exe.
phrase.translation: Ako inzistiraju na trčanje PhotoDemon u IDE, ne šaljite greške u vezi IDE ruši ili zamrzava. PhotoDemon programeri mogu baviti samo probleme i greške koje utječu na sastavljen.exe.

phrase.original: in the future, automatically apply these settings
phrase.translation: u budućnosti, automatski primijeniti ove postavke

phrase.original: This image contains more than 16 million colors. Before it can be displayed on your screen, it must be converted to a simpler format. This process is called tone mapping.
phrase.translation: Ova slika sadrži više od 16 milijuna boja. Prije nego što ga se može prikazati na zaslonu, mora se pretvoriti u jednostavnijem obliku. Ovaj proces se naziva mapiranje nijansi.

phrase.original: Save the image before closing it
Repeat this action for all unsaved images (X in total)
phrase.translation: Ponovite ovaj postupak za sve koje nisu spremljene slike (X ukupno)

phrase.original: Do not save the image (discard all changes)

phrase.translation: Odustani, i vratiti se na uređivanje

phrase.original:
NOTE: if you click 'Save', PhotoDemon will save this image using its current file name.
If you want to save it with a different file name, please select 'Cancel', then use the File -> Save As menu item.
phrase.translation:
NAPOMENA: ako kliknete „Spremi”, PhotoDemon će spasiti ovu sliku koristeći svoj trenutni datoteku name.
If želite ga spremiti sa drugim imenom datoteke, odaberite „Cancel”, zatim pomoću File -> Save As izbornika.

phrase.original: Because this image has not been saved before, you will be prompted to provide a file name for it.
phrase.translation: Budući da ova slika nije prije spašeni, od vas će biti zatraženo da daju ime datoteke za to.

phrase.original: If you do not save this image, any changes you have made will be permanently lost.
phrase.translation: Ako ne spasiti ovu sliku, sve promjene koje su napravljene će biti trajno izgubljeni.

phrase.original: Canceling will return you to the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: Otkazivanje će vas vratiti u glavni prozor PhotoDemon.

phrase.original: %1 has unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
phrase.translation: %1 ima promjene koje nisu spremljene. Što bi ti volio raditi?

phrase.original: Repeat this action for both unsaved images
phrase.translation: Ponovite ovaj postupak za oba nisu spremljene slike

phrase.original: Repeat this action for all unsaved images (%1 in total)
phrase.translation: Ponovite ovaj postupak za sve koje nisu spremljene slike ( %1 ukupno)

phrase.original: in the future, do not notify me of updates
phrase.translation: u budućnosti, ne me o promjenama obavijestiti

phrase.original: Learn more about the new features in %1
phrase.translation: Saznajte više o novim značajkama u %1

phrase.original: (Sorry, but automatic restarts don't work inside the IDE.)
phrase.translation: (Žao nam je, ali automatski ponovno pokreće ne rade unutar IDE.)

phrase.original: A new version of PhotoDemon is available. Restart the program to complete the update process.
phrase.translation: Nova verzija PhotoDemon je dostupna. Ponovno pokrenite program za dovršetak postupka ažuriranja.

phrase.original: Restart now to access to the latest version of the program.
phrase.translation: Ponovno pokretanje sada pristupiti na najnoviju verziju programa.

phrase.original: If you're in the middle of something, feel free to keep working. The update process will automatically complete whenever you next use the program.
phrase.translation: Ako ste u sredini nečega, slobodno nastaviti raditi. Proces ažuriranja će se automatski dovršiti kad god sljedeći koristiti program.

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the image
Note: you can also set a center position by clicking the preview window.
phrase.translation: Napomena: možete postaviti poziciju centra klikom na prozor pregleda.

phrase.original: Peering at image through imaginary kaleidoscope
Merging luminance and chroma into final image
phrase.translation: Spajanje osvjetljenje i intenzitet u konačnoj slici

phrase.original: Analyzing image in preparation for surface blur
phrase.translation: Analizom slika u pripremi za površinsku zamućenja

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the corrected area
phrase.translation: ako piksela leže izvan ispravljena područja

phrase.original: you can also set a center position by clicking the preview window
phrase.translation: možete postaviti poziciju centra klikom na prozor pregleda

phrase.original: Dipping image in virtual wave pool
phrase.translation: Porinuće slike u virtualnom vala bazen

phrase.original: Tracing image edges with virtual paintbrush
phrase.translation: Praćenje sliku rubova s virtualnim kistom

phrase.original: Searching each pixel range for edges
phrase.translation: Pretraživanje svaki piksel raspon za rubove

phrase.original: Note: you can also set a position by clicking the preview window.
phrase.translation: Napomena: možete postaviti poziciju klikom na prozor pregleda.

phrase.original: Bilateral filtering is a complex task, and on large images it can take a very long time to process. PhotoDemon can estimate certain parameters, providing a large speed boost at the cost of slightly lower quality.
phrase.translation: Bilateralna filtriranje je složen zadatak, a na velike slike može potrajati jako dugo vremena za obradu. PhotoDemon može procijeniti određene parametre, pružajući veliku brzinu poticaj po cijeni od nešto niže kvalitete.

phrase.original: Printing image to digital halftone surface
phrase.translation: Ispis slika u digitalni polutonova površinu

phrase.original: Applying petroleum jelly to camera lens
Applying pan and zoom (Ken Burns) effect
phrase.translation: Primjena pan i zoom (Ken Burns) učinak

phrase.original: If you want to enlarge the canvas to fit the rotated image, please use the Image -> Rotate menu instead.
phrase.translation: Ako želite veću sliku na platnu kako bi odgovarao rotiranu sliku, upotrijebite slike -> izbornik Rotate umjesto.

phrase.original: click OK to begin the repair operation
phrase.translation: kliknite U redu za početak rada popravak

phrase.original: attempt to repair video and audio files
phrase.translation: pokušavati popraviti video i audio datoteke

phrase.original: overwrite matching filenames in the destination folder
phrase.translation: prepisati podudaranje datoteka u odredišnoj mapi

phrase.original: after a successful recovery, erase the original (unrepaired) file
phrase.translation: Nakon uspješnog oporavka, obrisati izvornu (nepopravljenog) datoteku

phrase.original: generating list of files to repair

%1 files(s) repaired.
Repaired files have been saved to the destination folder. Unrepaired files remain in their original locations.
phrase.translation:
%1 datoteke (s) repaired.
Popravljeni datoteke su spremljeni u odredišnu mapu. Nepopravljenog datoteke ostaju u svojim izvornim mjestima.

phrase.original: The source folder does not contain any files. Please try another folder.
phrase.translation: Izvor mapa ne sadrži sve datoteke. Pokušajte drugu mapu.

phrase.original: Step 1: select the photo editing action(s) to apply to each image
phrase.translation: Korak 1: odaberite akciju za obradu slika (e) da se odnosi na svaku sliku

phrase.original: set export settings for this format
phrase.translation: set izvoza postavki za ovaj format

phrase.original: keep images in their original format
convert all images to a new format
phrase.translation: pretvoriti sve slike na novi format
primjenjuju se mjere za uređivanje fotografija

phrase.original: if you only want to rename images or change image formats, use this option
phrase.translation: ako samo želite preimenovati slike ili promijeniti formate slika, koristite ovu opciju

phrase.original: apply other actions from a saved macro file
phrase.translation: primjenjivati i druge radnje iz spremljene makro datoteku

phrase.original: remove all images in this folder
phrase.translation: ukloniti sve slike u ovoj mapi

phrase.original: (batch conversion process will appear here at run-time)
phrase.translation: (Batch proces pretvorbe će se pojaviti ovdje u radnom vremenu)

phrase.original: add a prefix to each filename
add a suffix to each filename
remove the following text (if found) from each filename
phrase.translation: uklonite sljedeći tekst (ako se nađe) iz svake datoteke

phrase.original: force each filename, including extension, to the following case
phrase.translation: prisiliti svaku datoteke, uključujući i proširenje na sljedeću slučaju

phrase.original: replace spaces in filenames with underscores
phrase.translation: zamijeniti mjesta u nazivima datoteka s podvlake
koristiti velika i mala slova podudaranja

phrase.original: after images are processed, save them with the following name
phrase.translation: Nakon obrade slika, spremite ih sa sljedećim imenom

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to cancel the current batch process?
phrase.translation: Jeste li sigurni da želite poništiti trenutačni serije proces?

phrase.original:
If you exit now, your batch list (the list of images to be processed) will be lost. By saving your list, you can easily resume this batch operation at a later date.
Would you like to save your batch list before exiting?
phrase.translation:
Ako izađete sada, popis serija (popis slika za prerađene) bit će izgubljeni. Spašavajući svoj popis, možete jednostavno nastaviti ovu seriju operaciju u kasnijoj date.
Would želite spremiti popis serija prije izlaska?

phrase.original: You have already created a list of images for processing. The list of images inside this file will be appended to the bottom of your current list.
phrase.translation: Već ste stvorili popis slika za obradu. Popis slika unutar datoteke će biti dodan na dno trenutnog popisa.

phrase.original: This is not a valid list of images. Please try a different file.
phrase.translation: Ovo nije važeći popis slika. Pokušajte neku drugu datoteku.

phrase.original: You have requested that a macro be applied to each image, but no macro file has been selected. Please select a valid macro file.
phrase.translation: Zatražili ste da makro može primijeniti na svaku sliku, ali ne i makro datoteka je odabrana. Odaberite valjanu makro datoteku.

phrase.original: You have not selected any images to process! Please add one or more images to the batch list.
phrase.translation: Niste odabrali sve slike na proces! Molimo dodajte jednu ili više slika na popis serija.

phrase.original: Before proceeding, you need to click the "set export settings for this format" button to specify what export settings you want to use.
phrase.translation: Prije nego što nastavite, potrebno je kliknuti na „postavljene postavke izvoza za ovaj format” gumb da odredite što postavki izvoz želite koristiti.

phrase.original: PhotoDemon cannot access the requested output folder. Please select a non-system, unrestricted folder for the batch process.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon ne mogu pristupiti traženi izlazni folder. Odaberite non-sustav, neograničeno mape za batch proces.

phrase.original: Welcome to PhotoDemon's batch wizard. This tool can be used to edit multiple images at once, in what is called a "batch process".
phrase.translation: Dobrodošli na PhotoDemon je hrpa čarobnjaka. Ovaj alat se može koristiti za uređivanje više slika odjednom, u ono što se naziva „batch proces”.

phrase.original: Start by selecting the photo editing action(s) you want to apply. If multiple actions are selected, they will be applied in the order they appear on this page.
phrase.translation: Započnite odabirom akcije za uređivanje fotografija (e) koje želite primijeniti. Ako su odabrani višestruki akcije, oni će se redoslijedom kojim se pojavljuju na ovoj stranici.

phrase.original: Note: a "macro" is simply a list of photo editing actions. It can include any adjustment, filter, or effect in the main program. You can create a new macro by using the "Tools -> Macros -> Record new macro" menu in the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: Napomena: „makro” je jednostavno popis akcija za uređivanje fotografija. To može uključivati bilo koju prilagodbu, filtar ili efekt u glavnom programu. Možete stvoriti nove makronaredbe pomoću „Alati -> Makro -> Unos novog makro” izbornika u glavnom prozoru PhotoDemon.

phrase.original: In the next step, you will select the images you want to process.
phrase.translation: U sljedećem koraku, od vas će izabrati slike koje želite obraditi.

phrase.original: Step 2: prepare the batch list (the list of images to be processed)
phrase.translation: Korak 2: priprema popis serije (popis slika biti obrađen)

phrase.original: You can add files to the batch list in two ways
phrase.translation: Možete dodati datoteke na popis serija na dva načina

phrase.original: 1) By manually adding one or more image file(s) using a standard Open Image dialog.
phrase.translation: 1) ručno dodavanje jednog ili više slikovnu datoteku (e) pomoću standardnog dijalog Otvori sliku.

phrase.original: 2) By adding entire folders at once. Image file(s) inside the folder (or subfolders, if selected) will be automatically identified.
phrase.translation: 2) Dodavanjem cijele mape odjednom. Slikovne datoteke (e) unutar mape (ili podmape, ako je odabrana) automatski će se identificirati.

phrase.original: In the next step, you will choose how you want the processed images saved.
phrase.translation: U sljedećem koraku, od vas će odabrati kako želite obrađene slike spremljene.

phrase.original: Step 3: choose a destination image format
PhotoDemon needs to know which format to use when saving the images in your batch list.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon treba znati koji format koji se koristi za spremanje slike na popisu serije.

phrase.original: If "keep images in their original format" is selected, PhotoDemon will attempt to save each image in its original format. If the original format is not supported, a standard format (JPEG or PNG, depending on color depth) will be used.
phrase.translation: Ako je odabrano „držati slike u izvornom obliku”, PhotoDemon će pokušati spasiti svaku sliku u izvornom obliku. Ako je izvorni format nije podržan, standardni format (JPEG ili PNG, ovisno o dubini boja) će se koristiti.

phrase.original: If you choose to save images to a new format, please make sure the format you have selected is appropriate for all images in your list. (For example, images with transparency should be saved to a format that supports transparency!)
phrase.translation: Ako se odlučite za spremanje slike u novom formatu, provjerite format koji ste odabrali je prikladno za sve slike u svoj popis. (Na primjer, slike s transparentnost treba spremiti u format koji podržava transparentnost!)

phrase.original: In the final step, you will choose how you want the saved files to be named.
phrase.translation: U posljednjem koraku, od vas će izabrati kako želite spremljene datoteke se zove.

phrase.original: Step 4: provide a destination folder and any renaming options
phrase.translation: Korak 4: osigurati odredišnu mapu i bilo preimenovanje opcije

phrase.original: In this final step, PhotoDemon needs to know where to save the processed images, and what name to give the new files.
phrase.translation: U ovom posljednjem koraku, PhotoDemon treba znati gdje spremiti obrađene slike, a ono ime dati nove datoteke.

phrase.original: For your convenience, a number of standard renaming options are also provided. Note that all items under "additional rename options" are optional.
phrase.translation: Radi Vaše udobnosti, broj standardnih opcija preimenovanje su također dostupni. Imajte na umu da se sve stavke u odjeljku „Dodatne opcije preimenovati” su obavezna.

phrase.original: Finally, if two or more images in the batch list have the same filename, and the "original filenames" option is selected, such files will automatically be given unique filenames upon saving (e.g. "original-filename (2)").
phrase.translation: Na kraju, ako dvije ili više slika na popisu serije imaju isti naziv datoteke, a „originalne nazive” opcija odabrana, takve datoteke će se automatski dobiti jedinstvene nazive datoteka nakon spremanja (na primjer, „izvorni-filename (2)”).

phrase.original: Step 5: wait for batch processing to finish
phrase.translation: Korak 5: čekati batch obrada do kraja

phrase.original: Once the batch processor has processed several images, it will display an estimated time remaining.
phrase.translation: Nakon što je serija procesor obradi nekoliko slika, ona će se prikazati procijenjeno preostalo vrijeme.

phrase.original: You can cancel batch processing at any time by pressing the "Cancel" button in the bottom-right corner. If you choose to cancel, any processed images will still be present in the output folder, so you may need to remove them manually.
phrase.translation: Možete otkazati skupne obrade u bilo kojem trenutku pritiskom na tipku „Odustani” u donjem desnom kutu. Ako odlučite otkazati, bilo obrađeno slike će i dalje biti prisutna u izlazne mape, tako da svibanj morati ukloniti ručno.

phrase.original: Save the current list of images
You haven't selected any image files. Please add one or more files to the batch list before saving.
phrase.translation: Niste odabrali niti slikovne datoteke. Molimo dodajte jednu ili više datoteka na popis serija prije spremanja.

phrase.original: if PhotoDemon does not support an image's original format, a standard format will be used
phrase.translation: ako PhotoDemon ne podržava sliku u izvorni oblik, standardni format će se koristiti

phrase.original: ( specifically, JPEG at 92% quality for photographs, and lossless PNG for non-photographs )
phrase.translation: (Konkretno, JPEG na 92 %za kvalitetu fotografija i gubitaka PNG za ne-fotografija)

phrase.original: processed before cancelation. Last processed image was "%1".
phrase.translation: obrađuju prije otkazivanja. Posljednja obrađena slika je „ %1”.

phrase.original: full download path (must begin with "http://" or "ftp://")
Attempting to connect to the Internet

%1 could not establish an Internet connection. Please double-check your connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the image manually using your Internet browser of choice. Once downloaded, you may open the file in %1 just like any other image file.
phrase.translation: %1 nije moguće uspostaviti vezu s Internetom. Dobro provjerite vezu. Ako se problem nastavi, pokušajte preuzeti sliku ručno internetski preglednik izbora. Jednom preuzeli, možete otvoriti datoteku u %1 baš kao i bilo koje druge datoteke slike.

phrase.original: Verifying image URL (this may take a moment)
phrase.translation: Provjera URL slike (to može potrajati nekoliko trenutaka)

phrase.original: %1 could not locate a valid file at that URL. Please double-check the path. If the problem persists, try downloading the file manually using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation: %1 nije moguće pronaći valjanu datoteku na taj URL. Molimo provjerio put. Ako se problem i dalje javlja, pokušajte ručno preuzimanje datoteka pomoću Internet preglednika.

phrase.original: %1 lost access to the Internet. Please double-check your Internet connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the file manually using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation: %1 izgubili pristup internetu. Dobro provjerite vezu s internetom. Ako se problem i dalje javlja, pokušajte ručno preuzimanje datoteka pomoću Internet preglednika.

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, %1 is preventing %2 from directly downloading this image. (Direct downloads are sometimes mistaken as hotlinking by misconfigured servers.)
You will need to download this file using your Internet browser, then manually load it into %2.
I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience, but unfortunately there is nothing %2 can do about stingy server configurations. :(
phrase.translation:
Nažalost, %1 sprječava %2 s direktno preuzimanje ove slike. (Direct download su ponekad griješi kao hotlinking konfigurirana poslužiteljima.)
You će morati preuzeti ovu sliku internetski preglednik, a zatim ručno učitati ga u %2.
I Iskreno se ispričavamo zbog neugodnosti, ali nažalost ne postoji ništa %2 može učiniti škrt konfiguracije poslužitelja.:(

phrase.original: This URL is not valid. Please make sure the URL begins with "http://" or "ftp://".
phrase.translation: Ovaj URL nije valjan. Provjerite je li URL počinje s „http:

phrase.original: Please be respectful of copyrights when downloading images. Even if an image is available online, it may not be licensed for use outside a specific website. Thanks!
phrase.translation: Molimo biti uljudan autorskih prava prilikom preuzimanja slike. Čak i ako je slika dostupna online, to ne može biti licenciran za korištenje izvan određenu web stranicu. Hvala!

phrase.original: Load each page as its own image
phrase.translation: Učitaj svaku stranicu kao svoju vlastitu sliku

phrase.original: always apply this action to multi-image files
phrase.translation: Uvijek primjeni ovu akciju na više slikovnih datoteka

phrase.original: %1 contains multiple pages (%2 in total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1 sadrži više stranica (2 %ukupno). Kako biste željeli nastaviti?

phrase.original: %1 is an animated GIF file (%2 frames total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1 je animirani GIF datoteka ( %2 okvira ukupno). Kako biste željeli nastaviti?

phrase.original: Load each frame as a separate image
phrase.translation: Učitavanje svaki okvir kao zasebna slika

phrase.original: This option will load every frame in the animated GIF file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija će učitati svaki okvir u animirane GIF datoteke kao pojedinačne slike.

phrase.original: This option will only load a single frame from the animated GIF file, effectively treating at as a non-animated GIF file.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija će učitati jedan okvir iz animirane GIF datoteke, učinkovito liječenje u obliku ne-animirani GIF datoteke.

phrase.original: %1 contains multiple icons (%2 in total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1 sadrži više ikona ( %2 ukupno). Kako biste željeli nastaviti?

phrase.original: Load each icon as a separate image
phrase.translation: Učitaj svaku ikonu kao zasebna slika

phrase.original: This option will load every icon in the ICO file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija će učitati svaku ikonu u ICO datoteke kao pojedinačne slike.

phrase.original: This option will only load a single icon from the ICO file.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija će učitati jednu ikonu iz ICO datoteke.

phrase.original: Load each page as a separate image
phrase.translation: Učitaj svaku stranicu kao zasebna slika

phrase.original: This option will load every page in the TIFF file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija neće učitati svaku stranicu u TIFF datoteke kao pojedinačne slike.

phrase.original: This option will only load a single page from the TIFF file.
phrase.translation: Ova opcija će učitati jednu stranicu iz TIFF datoteke.

phrase.original: currently available programs (listed by window title)
phrase.translation: Trenutno dostupni programi (navedeni po naslovu prozora)

phrase.original: Please select a window to capture.
This program is currently minimized. Restore it to normal size for best results.
phrase.translation: Ovaj program trenutno je svedena na minimum. Vrati se na normalnu veličinu za najbolje rezultate.

phrase.original: Some programs (including Windows Store apps) do not allow direct screen captures. If an application preview appears as a black square, you will need to take a full desktop screenshot, then manually crop the desired window region.
phrase.translation: Neki programi (uključujući Windows Store aplikacije) ne dopuštaju izravnu zaslon bilježi. Ako pregled aplikacije pojavljuje kao crni kvadrat, morat ćete uzeti puni desktop screenshot, a zatim ručno obrezivanje željeni prozor regiju.

phrase.original: one image spread across multiple pages (poster print)
phrase.translation: jedna slika proširila na više stranica (poster print)

phrase.original: In the next step, you can specify detailed layout information (margins, positioning, etc)
phrase.translation: U sljedećem koraku, možete navesti detaljne informacije izgled (margine, pozicioniranje, itd)

phrase.original: note: DPI is read-only when "fit to page" is selected.
phrase.translation: Napomena: DPI je samo za čitanje kad „stane na stranicu” je odabrana.

phrase.original: Print previewing requires the FreeImage plugin, which could not be located on this computer. To enable previewing, please go to Edit -> Preferences and select "check for missing plugins on program start." The next time you load PhotoDemon, it will offer to download this plugin for you.
phrase.translation: Ispis Pretpregled zahtijeva plugin FreeImage, koji nije mogao biti smješten na ovom računalu. Da biste omogućili pregleda, molimo idite na Edit - „provjerite dodatke koji nedostaju na programu start”> Preference i odaberite Sljedeći put kada učitavanje PhotoDemon, ona će ponuditi za download ovog dodatka za vas.

phrase.original: %1 was unable to print the image. Please make sure that the specified printer (%2) is powered-on and ready for printing.
phrase.translation: %1 nije bio u mogućnosti ispisati sliku. Molimo provjerite je li navedena pisač ( %2) pogon na i spreman za ispis.

phrase.original: Image printed successfully. (Note: depending on your printer, additional print confirmation screens may appear.)
phrase.translation: Slika je uspješno ispisana. (Napomena: ovisno o pisaču, mogu pojaviti dodatni ekrani za potvrdu ispisa.)

phrase.original: Waiting for user to specify export options
phrase.translation: Čeka korisnicima da navedu mogućnosti izvoza
prozirna boja (desni klik na sliku za odabir)
Visoki stupanj kompresije, slabe kvalitete slike (64: 1)

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (256:1)
phrase.translation: Super kompresija, vrlo loša kvaliteta slike (256: 1)

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (20)
phrase.translation: Super kompresija, vrlo loša kvaliteta slike (20)

phrase.original: change file extension to match color model
phrase.translation: promijeniti datotečni nastavak odgovarati model boja

phrase.original: click to generate a new preview image
phrase.translation: kliknite za generiranje novog pregled slike

phrase.original: please wait while a new preview image is created
phrase.translation: Pričekajte dok se novi pregled slika stvara

phrase.original: These lossy optimization settings reduced file size by %1.
phrase.translation: Ove gubljenje postavke optimizacije smanjiti veličinu datoteke %1.

phrase.original: the fast, free, portable photo editor
phrase.translation: brz i besplatan, prijenosni foto urednik

phrase.original: Participate in development, design, or translation work
phrase.translation: Sudjeluju u razvoju, projektiranju, ili prevođenja

phrase.original: PhotoDemon is Copyright %1 2001-2017 by Tanner Helland and Contributors
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon is Copyright %1 2001-2017 by Tanner Helland and Contributors

phrase.original: Note: this operation will flatten the image before resizing it.
phrase.translation: Napomena: ova operacija će poravnati sliku prije promjene veličine.
Inicijalizacija sadržajem svjesni promjenu veličine motora

phrase.original: Remove tags that might contain personal information
phrase.translation: Uklonite oznake koje bi mogli sadržavati osobne podatke

phrase.original: Reset tag to its original value
phrase.translation: Reset oznaku na svoju izvornu vrijednost

phrase.original: Mark this entire group for removal
phrase.translation: Označite cijelu ovu grupu za uklanjanje

phrase.original: Reset entire group to its original values
phrase.translation: Reset cijelu grupu da svojim izvornim vrijednostima

phrase.original: Metadata support is provided by the open-source ExifTool library.
phrase.translation: Metapodaci podrška osigurana je open-source ExifTool knjižnici.

phrase.original: "System" tags are provided by the operating system. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: „Sustav” oznake pružaju operativnog sustava. Oni nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodataka.

phrase.original: "File" tags are required by this image format. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: „File”, oznake su po ovom formatu slike. Oni nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodataka.

phrase.original: ICC profiles are handled automatically by PhotoDemon. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: ICC profili su automatski obrađene od strane PhotoDemon. Oni nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodataka.

phrase.original: "Inferred" tags are hypothetical values inferred from other metadata. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: „Izvedene iz” oznake su hipotetske vrijednosti zaključiti iz drugih metapodataka. Oni nisu ugrađeni kao tradicionalni metapodataka.

phrase.original: This is a protected tag. Edits are allowed, but they may be overwritten to produce a valid image file.
phrase.translation: To je zaštićena oznaka. Izmjene su dopušteni, ali oni mogu biti prepisan proizvesti valjanu datoteku slike.

phrase.original: This tag is restricted. It cannot be edited, and removal requests will be ignored if they result in an invalid file.
phrase.translation: Ova oznaka je ograničen. Ne može se uređivati i zahtjeve za uklanjanje će se zanemariti ako oni dovesti do nevažeće datoteku.
Samo datumi (GGGG: mm: dd HH: MM: SS [.ss] [

phrase.original: list of %1, one entry per line
Click to change the color used for empty borders
phrase.translation: Kliknite za promjenu boje koja se koristi za prazne granica

phrase.original: when changing aspect ratio, fit image to new size by
phrase.translation: kada se mijenja omjer širine i visine, u formi slike za novu veličinu

phrase.original: fitting inclusively, with transparent borders as necessary
phrase.translation: dolikuje uključivo, s prozirnim granicama, po potrebi

phrase.original: fitting exclusively, and cropping as necessary
phrase.translation: montaže isključivo, i reže prema potrebi

phrase.original: Resampling affects the quality of a resized image. For a good summary of resampling techniques, visit the Image Resampling article on Wikipedia.
phrase.translation: Resampling utječe na kvalitetu slike promijenjene veličine. Za dobar sažetak resampling tehnika, posjetite slike resampling članak na Wikipediji.

phrase.original: By default, descriptive names are used in place of technical ones. Advanced users can toggle this option to expose more resampling techniques.
phrase.translation: Prema zadanim postavkama, opisni nazivi koriste se umjesto tehničke one. Napredni korisnici mogu mijenjati ovu opciju izložiti više resampling tehnika.

phrase.original: When changing an image's aspect ratio, undesirable stretching may occur. PhotoDemon can avoid this by using empty borders or cropping instead.
phrase.translation: Kada se mijenja omjer širine i sliku je, nepoželjno istezanje može dogoditi. PhotoDemon mogu izbjeći ovu pomoću prazne granice ili obrezivanje umjesto.

phrase.original: make the new layer the active layer
color to erase (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: boje za brisanje (desni klik pregled za odabir)

phrase.original: Adding new alpha channel to image
phrase.translation: Dodavanje novog alfa kanal na sliku

phrase.original: Add a blank layer to the image.
Move the current layer upward in the layer stack.
phrase.translation: Premjesti trenutni sloj prema gore u sloju stog.

phrase.original: Move the current layer downward in the layer stack.
